mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into product (gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, product_type, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_department, hospital_contact, hospital_tel, status, status_change_time, status_operator, repair_times, maintenance_times, month_sample_count, day_sample_count, current_sample_count, region, province, city, district, ship_date, remarks) values (#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusChangeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repairTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maintenanceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monthSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{daySampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update product set gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_model = #{productModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_type = #{productType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_name = #{hospitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_address = #{hospitalAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_department = #{hospitalDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_contact = #{hospitalContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hospital_tel = #{hospitalTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_change_time = #{statusChangeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status_operator = #{statusOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repair_times = #{repairTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maintenance_times = #{maintenanceTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month_sample_count = #{monthSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day_sample_count = #{daySampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_sample_count = #{currentSampleCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ship_date = #{shipDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, product_type, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_department, hospital_contact, hospital_tel, status, status_change_time, status_operator, repair_times, maintenance_times, month_sample_count, day_sample_count, current_sample_count, region, province, city, district, ship_date, remarks from product where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, serial_number, product_name, product_model, product_type, hospital_name, hospital_address, hospital_department, hospital_contact, hospital_tel, status, status_change_time, status_operator, repair_times, maintenance_times, month_sample_count, day_sample_count, current_sample_count, region, province, city, district, ship_date, remarks from product
select * from product where serial_number like "%"#{searchInfo}"%" or hospital_name like "%"#{searchInfo}"%" order by id desc
